About this website:

Welcome to the "Cool Code Realm" â€“ your personal gateway to a world of coding wonders! The aim of this website is to create a public code library where you can explore lab programs and other interesting codes and projects.

Learn by Understanding and Practicing:

Learning by understanding is crucial because it helps you truly grasp the concepts and ideas behind something.
That's why this website provides not only the actual code but also explanations for each code so that you can learn the reasons and logic behind the code and sharpen your coding skills.
